title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the database field correctly based on the content type.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Prepare a database field with three types of content: 
   a) HTML text within the <html>...</html> tags. 
   b) HTML fragments not within the <html> tags. 
   c) Text with RTF tags. 
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field and observe the displayed text.
